hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe
cd $WORKSPACE export VECTORCAST_DIR=/home/vectorindia/vcast_64u export VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=/home/vectorindia/vector-license/vector-VECTORINDIA.lic export PYTHONPATH=/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:PYTHONPATH echo $VECTORCAST_DIR $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast --version cp -r /home/vectorindia/firefox/firefox/* $WORKSPACE/.
. ./make_config echo "---- Results for VcTools Version:`$VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version` " >> ../../firefox_results
(../../metricscmd )> ../../firefoxvcshell.txt 2>../../firefoxvcshelltiming.txt
($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getmetrics) > ../../firefoxvcdbmetrics.txt 2>../../firefoxvcdbmetricstiming.txt
$VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb clearmetrics
(../../utilmetricscmd) > ../../firefoxvcutilmetricscmd.txt 2>../../firefoxvcutilmetricscmdtiming.txt
($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getmetrics) > ../../firefoxvcgetmetrics.txt 2>../../firefoxvcgetmetricstiming.txt
(../../utilqikcmd) > ../../firefoxutilqikcmd.txt 2>../../firefoxvcutilqikcmdtiming.txt
(../../utilinstcmd) > ../../firefoxutilinstcmd.txt 2>../../firefoxvcutilinstcmdtiming.txt
(../../utilincrinstcmd) > ../../firefoxutilincrinstcmd.txt 2> ../../firefoxutilincrinstcmdtiming.txt
